author: Brainerd Dispatch
title: Ground News - Lake ice is deteriorating fast
text:
Summary by Brainerd Dispatch BRAINERD A topic of conversation over Christmas may have centered on an unlikely math conversion table as in how much back-breaking snow would be on the ground if temperatures were colder. Instead a seemingly endless amount of rain fell across the Brainerd lakes area with dreary day piling up after dreary day and the unusual sound of falling rain day and night in late December. It turns out the snow to rain ratio is a bit complicated to me… Share menu More
